 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָעַד‎</span> **verb** ==support, sustain, stay== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, especially ***take a meal***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְעַד‎</span> ***support, stay***; Zinjirli <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סעד‎</span> ***strengthen*** [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>330</sup>, ***support***, perhaps ***feed*** [[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>85</sup>; Christian-Palestinian Aramaic noun <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***aid***, [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 64</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> III, IV. ***aid, assist***, [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1360</sup>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***forearm*** Id<sup>1362</sup>; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סעד‎</span> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Südar. Ait. p. 16</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְסָעַד‎</span> consecutive [[Prov.20.28|Prov 20:28]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְעָ֑ד‎</span> 3 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּסְעָדֵ֫נִי‎</span> [[Ps.18.36|Ps 18:36]], read also in \|\| [[2Sam.22.36|2Sam 22:36]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְעָד‎</span> [[Judg.19.5|Judg 19:5]] (on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ָ   ‎</span> probably <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***©***</u></abbr> by error, see [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 261 f.</sup> [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]<sup>on the passage</sup>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְעָדנָֿא‎</span> v[[Judg.19.8|Judg 19:8]] (compare ***id.***), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּסֳעָ֑דָה‎</span> [[1Kgs.13.7|1Kgs 13:7]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְעָדֵנִי‎</span> [[Ps.119.117|Ps 119:117]] ***Infinitive construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּלְסַעֲדָהּ‎</span> [[Isa.9.6|Isa 9:6]] — ***support, sustain***, always figurative: 

**1.** ***sustain, stay***, the heart (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵבָב‎</span> **8**, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵב‎</span> **8**), with food [[Gen.18.5|Gen 18:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Judg.19.5|Judg 19:5]] (c. 2 accusative), v[[Judg.19.8|Judg 19:8]], [[Ps.104.15|Ps 104:15]] object omitted [[1Kgs.13.7|1Kgs 13:7]]. 

**2. a.** ***support*** throne (subject king) [[Prov.20.28|Prov 20:28]], coming ruler [[Isa.9.6|Isa 9:6]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***support, uphold*** with accusative of person (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, his hand etc.) [[Ps.18.36|Ps 18:36]] + \|\| [[2Sam.22.36|2Sam 22:36]] (v ***above***), [[Ps.20.3|Ps 20:3]]; [[Ps.41.4|Ps 41:4]]; [[Ps.94.18|Ps 94:18]]; [[Ps.119.117|Ps 119:117]].
